statements: SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 70;
SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100.4;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND heart_rate < 80
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM patient_vital_signs ORDER BY blood_pressure ASC, patient_id DESC
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 97.5 AND 99.5
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, vital_sign_name, vital_sign_value FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE vital_sign_value > 100
SELECT patient_id, vital_sign_name, vital_sign_value, timestamp FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1001
SELECT alert_id, patient_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM AlertLogs WHERE patient_id = 2003 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_id, vital_sign_name, MAX(vital_sign_value) AS max_value FROM PatientVitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT AVG(vital_sign_value), COUNT(*) FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE vital_sign_name = 'Heart Rate'
SELECT patient_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_type IN ('High Blood Pressure', 'Low Oxygen Levels')
SELECT patient_id, vital_sign_name, vital_sign_value FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2021-10-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 36.5 AND 37.5;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 100 AND heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts INNER JOIN vital_signs ON alerts.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id WHERE vital_signs.temperature < 98.6;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100 AND blood_pressure LIKE '120/%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, email FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT alert_id, patient_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE threshold > 10 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM monitoring_sessions WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT name, email FROM Providers;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate, MAX(blood_pressure) AS max_blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, VitalSigns.heart_rate FROM Patients INNER JOIN VitalSigns ON Patients.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT MonitoringSessions.*, Providers.name AS provider_name FROM MonitoringSessions INNER JOIN Providers ON MonitoringSessions.patient_id = Providers.provider_id ORDER BY session_id ASC
SELECT Alerts.alert_message, Patients.name AS patient_name FROM Alerts INNER JOIN Patients ON Alerts.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.age > 50
